docs.text: A core package for Sthali development Docs : https://project-sthali.github.io/sthali-core/ PyPI : https://pypi.org/project/sthali-core/ Source : https://github.com/project-sthali/sthali-core/ Board : https://github.com/users/project-sthali/projects/1/

docs.text: Instalation Using PYPI pip install sthali-core Using GitHub repo git clone https://github.com/project-sthali/sthali-core.git cd sthali-core pip install .
docs.title: Installation

docs.text: pip install sthali-core
docs.title: Using PYPI

docs.text: git clone https://github.com/project-sthali/sthali-core.git cd sthali-core pip install .

docs.text: Requirements Prerequisites python >= 3.10 pip package manager Runtime Dependencies This project requires the following Python packages with specific versions: cookiecutter >= 2.6.0 fastapi >= 0.115.13 mkdocs >= 1.6.1 pydantic >= 2.11.7 PyYAML >= 6.0.2 tomli >= 2.2.1 typer >= 0.16.0 uvicorn >= 0.34.3 Optional Dependencies This project has optional dependencies that can be installed for additional features: dev coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1 ruff >= 0.12.0 tests coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1 stage build >= 1.2.1 coverage[toml] >= 7.9.1
docs.title: Requirements

docs.text: sthali_core.utils.base Base utilities for Sthali Core. App Represents the FastAPI application. AppSpecification Represents the application specification. Config Manages application configuration.

docs.text: sthali_core.utils.enum_clients Dynamically creates an Enum for available clients. Config Discovers and provides an Enum for client modules.

docs.text: sthali_core.utils.run_server Utilities for running the FastAPI server. main Run the FastAPI application using Uvicorn. Args: app (fastapi.FastAPI): The FastAPI application instance to run. port (int): The port number to run the server on. Defaults to 8000. run Initialize and return the FastAPI application. Args: config: The configuration class. app_spec: The application specification class. app: The application class. Returns: The configured FastAPI application instance.
docs.title: run_server

docs.text: Utilities for running the FastAPI server.
docs.title: sthali_core.utils.run_server

docs.text: Run the FastAPI application using Uvicorn. Args: app (fastapi.FastAPI): The FastAPI application instance to run. port (int): The port number to run the server on. Defaults to 8000.
docs.title: main

docs.text: Initialize and return the FastAPI application. Args: config: The configuration class. app_spec: The application specification class. app: The application class. Returns: The configured FastAPI application instance.
